page.title: 06Employment in Pontycymer
page.content:
Employment in Pontycymer has been dominated by the one industry-COAL. With the growth of the town, employment has also been created in the opening of workshops and service trades such as breadmaking , smiths , carpentry etc. The following figures from the Pontycymer employment exchange indicate how large a number of people are employed in the mines and thus how important the mines were in employment terms:- 1950 1966 Agricultural 0.2% __ and Foresty Mining 72.1% 80.6% manufacturing 2.6% 0.8% service trades 25.1% 18.6%
